sources.title: "The Indian Brothers" (1911) director D. W. Griffith cinematographer Billy Bitzer
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems     This is a short preview. You can watch the whole film here: https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/index.php/gems-for-donation     "The Indian Brothers" is a short drama. The film is included in our program to illustrate the work of Billy Bitzer, a star of Silent Hall of Fame. When an Indian chief is murdered, his brother chases the killer to bring him to justice. Directed by                       D.W. sources.title: The Indian Brothers
sources.description: The Indian Brothers is a 1911 D.W. Griffith Biograph Studios short.

metadata.Plot: A renegade Indian kills a chief who has insulted him. The chief's brother swears vengeance and pursues the renegade, overtaking him just in time to rescue him from another tribe who are angry with him for stealing a horse.
metadata.Actors: Frank Opperman, Wilfred Lucas, Guy Hedlund
